sentence: It marks a rapid transformation for Stefanik, who has sought to firmly align herself with former president Donald Trump and his nativist Make America Great Again? agenda over the last year after she replaced Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)

sentence: And among the loudest voices denouncing the GOPs flirtation with fringe nationalism are a pair of Capitol Hill Republicans Reps. Liz Cheney (Wyo.)

sentence: Wyoming Republican Rep. Liz Cheney took aim at Stefanik, who replaced her in GOP House leadership after an ugly fight last year.
